YOUR PENSIONS
In order to show your expected income in retirement, we need to know the value of your current pensions

Do you have a Final Salary pension?
You get a final Salary pension or defined benefit pension from a workplace
scheme that promises you a certain amount of pension at retirement.
The amount you’re paid at retirement is based on how many years you’ve
worked for your employer and the salary you’ve earned.

For the purposes of this tool you will need to enter your estimated annual
pension at retirement.
